storyInfo: Silver and Anastasio disagree over the treatment of the captured crew. Elysium has infiltrated the camp and manages to find Thorns, who has agreed to help Juana repair the compass.

attributes.content: G-Gracias...
attributes.name: Hungry Townsfolk

attributes.content: I injured a holy man when I corralled the burdenbeasts and startled one by accident. I will forsake half of my serving as penance.
attributes.name: Stoic Townsfolk

attributes.content: No, eat up so that it doesn't happen again.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: There's enough saltfin for everyone. Eat.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But, Señor Silver, overeating is—
attributes.name: Stoic Townsfolk

attributes.content: Is better than letting food go to waste. Saltfin flesh won't last in this weather. Finish it before it spoils.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Kindly bring these to our injured brothers, my good chef.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: They need something nutritious to eat, after the beating they've taken these past few days.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Have you reviewed the plan, Señor Alguacil?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I do not understand how such a notion could have even occurred to you.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: If the bandits surrender the compass and the blueprints for a salt ship, I will pardon most of them and permit them to live as I allow them to.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Many are young and healthy. They will be invaluable labor if this town is to move.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Besides, it will convenient to have sword hands unbound by religious dogma, in the event of any future negotiations.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: They will destroy your town.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Eliminate the Ægir leading them, and the rest are just a disorganized mob. The three whom we have locked up in the basement are each playing their own game.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I will split them and give them conflicting interests, such that if they do raise their swords, it will only be against their former fellows.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: You once saved these townsfolk, taught them to suppress desire and maintain purity... yet now you would pardon the very bandits who murdered their friends and family, all for worldly benefit?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Did you imagine the people accepting this?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: How is this anything less than a betrayal?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: What would you suggest, then?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I would lead our men into the Flat without delay, eliminate the surviving bandits, and destroy the very means by which they have sinned.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Our injured brothers need rest.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: We have neither the manpower nor the resources for another major campaign.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I will ensure they are ready.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I hope you'll forgive my bluntness, Señor Alguacil.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: But the three bandits in the basement will 'escape' at nightfall. If all goes well, they will soon bring news back to their fellows.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: All I need from you is to maintain order when the bandits come to negotiate.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What made you change your mind?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's just a compass. There wasn't much to think about.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Would someone with so little on their mind have such restless hands? Should I be worrying about you making a hole in my ship, joven?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm not that strong.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Come now, don't be like that. I hope you realize that being serious all the time only makes you the butt of the joke.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Now grab a change of clothes. You have blood all over you.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...Gracias.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: *Cough* *Cough*...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Sorry, I should have told you to hold your breath. This cabin hasn't been used in decades, and there's dust everywhere.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I'm sorry for touching things without permission.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Don't make me sound like such a petty woman.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You can touch whatever you want here. It's all top-notch alchemical equipment. Unless your hands are more dangerous than cannon fire or a storm, they'll survive.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: This will be your lab from now on.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You have a full-fledged alchemy lab on your ship?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Before I forget...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: These clothes belonged to the previous alchemist. You're about the same size, so try them on.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Oh, uh...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You can change in the storage room to your left.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Do I look weird?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Of course not. It fits you well.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Do you like it? The style is decades-old, but it was tailor-made with the finest fabrics.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It feels brand-new, though.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It was meant to be a coming-of-age gift. But he fell into the sea along with the shells of the Iberian Defensa the very day before reaching adulthood.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I searched for his body myself, but never found a trace. I only hope it was the fins that got him. There weren't quite so many Seaborn back then.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You've fought the Iberian Defensa?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: This was before the Profound Silence, when we still sailed the high seas. This very ship, La Conquista, was captured in that era.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I don't suppose you have an interest in history?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: No, I've just heard a few tales about the ocean.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Then fix the compass and see it with your own eyes.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: First you wanted me to fix your compass, now you want me to follow you out to sea?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It requires an alchemist to operate it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Let me have a good look at you. Hm... raise your collar a bit, wear the shawl over your shoulder... not bad at all.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Er, I can handle the rest...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Try to avoid any strenuous effort for a few days. Your injuries aren't life-threatening, but given the hygiene on the ship, you can never be too careful.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Yes, yes... Oh! I know what's missing!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: How could I forget?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I haven't given you the compass yet.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Isidro takes the compass from Juana and caresses its surface.
It is light, and cold.
I can't guarantee success, but I'll give it my all.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Your all, you say?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: When I make a promise, I intend to keep it.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Then you shall have all the support I can offer.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Good. First, I'll need an assistant. I'm not asking a lot, just someone clever and hard-working.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Naturally.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Right, and I have one other present for you.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: If what the boss says is true, then we're out of options.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The townsfolk now control the route from the Flat to the inland, and we're their mortal enemies.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: There's no way back. We have to face the ocean.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Is there really no other way?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Señor Rus! Señor Javier!
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Slow down and breathe. What's going on?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Th-They're back!
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Who's back?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: O-Our mates who got caught! They escaped and came back!
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: And they brought someone with them!
attributes.name: Anxious Sailor

attributes.content: Take a look at this scallywag I found outside!
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: Healthy, works hard, don't eat much. And he's yours for two months of saltfin garum!
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: His face is kind of nice...
attributes.name: Joyful Sailor

attributes.content: He's all skin and bones. A flick of a saltfin's tail would send him packing...
attributes.name: Aloof Sailor

attributes.content: Hey! I take exception to that!
I'll have you know I'm ripped under this loose fit!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Okay, going for one-and-a-half months of saltfin garum!
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: For an absolute adonis like me? I'm worth at least a year of that fin stuff!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Shut up already! Can't you see no one wants you?
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: Going for one year of saltfin garum!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: One month!
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: Two years!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Two weeks!
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: Three years!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Pah! Three days!
attributes.name: Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: Deal!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Elysium & Auctioning Sailor

attributes.content: Three days of saltfin garum, under my name. Deal?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Perfect timing. I was just thinking I needed a bodyguard.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Now what to call you... How about Pelirrojito, for that red streak you've got?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You were hiding all this under the Salt Flat?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Shh, do you want the neighbors to hear?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That wasn't funny.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I'm more surprised you even noticed the joke.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: So did you want me to help you kill this Seaborn?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Then why bring me here?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You came to the Salt Flat seeking a school of swordplay founded by a pirate, did you not?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Then congratulations, you've found it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: When you need a break from repairing the compass, you can come here and learn from it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: From a Seaborn?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: A Seaborn that has devoured countless swordsmen. With every movement of its appendages, it recreates their skills.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Perhaps as an attempt to escape, or perhaps a meaningless act of imitation...
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: ...What exactly is going on here?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It is difficult to explain. After trapping it here, I issued a bounty, inviting any swordsman to try their hand at killing it.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Many have attempted it, but all have become a part of it, along with their blades.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Now I'm even more confused. Why did you trap it here? Why were you looking for someone to kill it?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And why do you want me to learn swordplay from it?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I was never the original captain of the fleet. It was it... him.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Him?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: His name was Cruz.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: When the waters that inundated this land subsided, the remaining Seaborn began to attack the cities in a frenzy.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We fought hard and slew most of them, but this one was particularly hard to kill. Cruz lured it into a cave, using himself as bait, and both became trapped here.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The last time I saw him, he named me captain and asked me to bring the others back to the sea.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Why not tell them the truth? I've heard the crew spreading terrible rumors about you and the Seaborn.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Let them. A leader needs to be feared as well as loved.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: So you came up with this entire plan back then?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: No. It was Cruz who gave it to me. He had long expected that he would die before I did, so he told me everything, that I might continue his work after his death.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You should have freed him from... this...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I wanted to. But it's not that easy.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I couldn't do it, not with my own hands... Even though I know it's just a Seaborn. I love him, just as I love the time we spent sailing far and wide.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Promise me. Learn everything you can from it, as much as your little sponge of a brain can absorb.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That way, at least, I'll get to see his swordplay once more.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Leaf? You've got news from Elysium...?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Play recording.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Weedy... I followed the escaping bandits back to their den.
attributes.name: Recording

attributes.content: Don't worry, no one knows who I am. And I found someone who can protect me.
attributes.name: Recording

attributes.content: She has a lot of connections here. I'm sure I'll find Thorns soon.
attributes.name: Recording

attributes.content: Just sit back and wait for the good news.
attributes.name: Recording

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Bring the crates over here, Pelirrojito!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Yes, boss!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Not bad! You're stronger than you look. Now I want to hear that same energy in your selling.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You got it, boss! I've already memorized the entire list of goods, forwards and backwards!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: (I'm done listening to you the moment I find Thorns!)
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Look, people are coming! Say it so they can hear!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Prosthetic eyeballs! Made from the finest saltfin bones for maximum comfort, in any color you want!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Aged saltfin garum from our special collection! A flavor you won't forget!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Don't miss this chance, señores and señoras!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: (Wow... this guy's a natural. Doesn't sound like a slave at all...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Come one, come all, there's something for everyone!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: *Cough* *Cough* I'm getting hoarse, Boss...
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Everybody's staring, but why is no one stopping by?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Yeah... it's weirdly quiet. I'd expect someone to have picked a fight with me by now.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Would you care for one, señor? Could come in handy someday!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: No thanks, Pascuala...
attributes.name: Flustered Sailor

attributes.content: Well, if you're not buying, you're not buying, but what's that look? Gives me the creeps.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I suggest you put your tail between your legs and behave yourself.
attributes.name: Flustered Sailor

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Didn't you say you were well-connected?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: I am! Just imagine how much worse it'd be for an outsider like you without me here to smooth things over.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (These two never used to give me a second glance. Why'd they stop to glare at me today?)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You know what, just close up the stall and pack up for today. I'm gonna go ask around.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Is it true what those guys were saying?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Yeah, I sent someone to check.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Do you trust them? That if we hand over the compass and the thief, we all get pardoned and can live in town?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: It's hard to believe.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Then why'd you let that chaval from the city with the red hair onto our fleet?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I don't know what to believe anymore, Rus.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Could be the fickle sea, could be some inscrutable show of good faith. Whatever it is, keeping him around gives us more options.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: If it comes to it... the chica is the easy part: just tie her up and hand her over. But how in the hell would we get the compass from the boss?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I... I'll talk to her. This is about the whole fleet. She'll listen.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Talk?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: I used to think maybe you could convince her, but now I'm sure she'd just drag you right back in.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What do you want me to do then?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Who knows? You get to make decisions for the fleet, not me.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: (Those Inquisition finshits... Now they're just playing dirty...)
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: What's with all the sighing, boss?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: I heard... *sob*... I heard...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Come on, don't cry, you can tell me. Maybe I can help.
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: You're so nice, Pelirrojito, *sob*...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Who else would I count on here?)
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: I'm worried about you.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Ahem. What does this have to do with me, boss?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: It's one thing to be drifting around on my own, but now I've got you to care of.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: I'm not fired, am I? After all the work I've done for you?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: No... I'm just worried about you getting left all alone with these bandits if something happens to me.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (This is practically blackmail!)
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: ...Wow, I didn't think you cared, boss! Don't worry, nothing'll happen to you on my watch!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Oh, Pelirrojito!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Boss!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: I... I heard them talking... they want to hand me over to the Inquisition!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: The Inquisition chased me all the way into the Salt Flat! All because of a compass that used to belong to my family!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Your family?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: I may not look it, but my family used to be rich and famous!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: But everything we had was sold off, and the compass somehow ended up with the Inquisition.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Wow, that's amazing, boss!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: (Yeah right.)
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: So, what do you need me to do?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Ahem. I heard the fleet's alchemist is looking for an assistant, and he's got the boss's trust big time. So, uh, maybe you could try applying?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You're clever and hardworking and I'm sure you'll get along like peanut butter and jelly! Then you can put in a good word for me.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Why not just do it yourself?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Well, me and him have a little bit of a history... Maybe more than a bit...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Anyhow, just work that silver tongue keep an eye out for your chance!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: No problem, boss! I'll step up as soon as he needs me!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Maybe don't be TOO eager... In the end, it comes down to timing.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: We can't make things too easy for him. He's gotta soak in the anxiety, then you can show up right when he needs you most. That way, he'll be helpless without you.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Why are you making this weird?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Both of our fates are in your hands, Pelirrojito.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (You can eat finshit for all I care once I get in that alchemist's good graces!)
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Waahh!
attributes.name: Crying Sailor

attributes.content: H-How could he say that!
attributes.name: Crying Sailor

attributes.content: Hey, wasn't that Steelface Pele?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Steelface Pele?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Yeah, says he didn't so much as whimper when he fell from the mast last year.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: So why was he crying like a little kid after leaving that room?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Are you here to interview for the alchemist assistant's job?
attributes.name: Terrified Sailor

attributes.content: Er... yeah...
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Turn back if you know what's good for you, chaval.
attributes.name: Terrified Sailor

attributes.content: Does he have a bad temper?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: No, worse.
attributes.name: Terrified Sailor

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, Pelirrojito. He's a nice guy. He even saved my life.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Sure, but work always brings out the worst in us.
attributes.name: Terrified Sailor

attributes.content: Now that you mention it...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: He kicked me out in three seconds flat! Said I was breathing too loud!
attributes.name: Terrified Sailor

attributes.content: (Whisper) Hey, boss, you said you had a history with this guy, right?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: (Whisper) What about it?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: (Whisper) You're trying to throw me into a fire! I'm not going in!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: (Whisper) We're already here! You're not out of this that easy!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: No, I'm not going! Whatever you're up to, nothing good can come of it!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Just go in! Stop running away!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Get off my shoulders!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Yow! Stop pulling on my eyebrows! I can't see!
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Hey, watch where you're going! You're gonna hit the door!
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Ow ow ow...
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Whatever the reason for this racket, you're interrupting my work.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Either I toss you out the window, or you show yourselves out. Choose.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Sorry, sorry, I just wanted to recommend you an assistant.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You mean another of those guys who couldn't tell a beaker from a flask? No thank you, you can keep them.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: You sure don't mince your words, do you?
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: He's new here, Isidro, doesn't know how things work. Don't mind him.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Yup, me.
attributes.name: 'Pelirrojito'

attributes.content: Er, excuse me?
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Nobody pays any attention to Pascuala. Isidro puts his hand on the shoulder of 'Pelirrojito'.
Who in turn puts his arm on Isidro's shoulder, their two arms linked like cables connecting a bridge.
They pat each other's shoulders so hard, they might as well be punching each other.
Pelirrojito's face turns as red as the streak in his hair, grimacing in pain.
As for Isidro...
Have they been starving you? You pat like a wimp.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Do you even know how much weight I lost looking for you? Hope you're ready to buy me a good meal.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Señores...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: How did you find me?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: We can talk about that later. Let's talk about you. How did you get here with all your limbs intact, you lucky boy?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...What's with the tone of disappointment?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Excuse me...
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: Pascuala finds no room in the conversation for her to butt in.
Never mind.
attributes.name: Pascuala

attributes.content: She turns around and leaves, politely closing the door behind her.
